title: Oui Oui Days
original_name: ういうい・days; ういうい days
sinopse: It’s about school life and there are three girls and three guys but only the first guy and girl are introduced in the first chapter. The girl, Taeko, even forgets her own friends’ names, and the guy, Ushio, is also an airhead. They make a cute couple. (From B-U)
